name: CW Easy Video Player
author: Christian Wenzl

sections.description:
The plugin for including videos with easy video player (evp) is sometimes buggy.

With CW EVP, you can easy integrate evp-videos just with a short snippet in your content. Works with posts and pages. Just install, complete the hostname under MEDIA and add the videos to your content. Posts and pages are supported.
sections.installation:
1. Install the ZIP-File cw-show-on-selected-pages.zip with the Plugin-Installer
  2. Complete the hostname under MEDIA (you need an already installed version of easy video player).
  3. Include the code snippet as shown under screenshot in your post/page.
sections.faq:
Does this plugin include the easy video player itself?

No, you have to buy and install Easy Video Player separately. You can find it under http://www.easyvideoplayer.com

Other questions or problems?

Just contact me: http://www.christian-wenzl.de
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Added short info for the user, that video is loading. Hides automatically after 5 seconds.

1.0

  • Language support added (english and german included)

0.9

  • First release on wordpress.org

short_description: Easy way to include videos from the Easy Video Player to your posts and pages.
description:
The plugin for including videos with easy video player (evp) is sometimes buggy.

With CW EVP, you can easy integrate evp-videos just with a short snippet in your content. Works with posts and pages. Just install, complete the hostname under MEDIA and add the videos to your content. Posts and pages are supported.

screenshots.caption: Complete the hostname after installation of cw-evp.
Copy this snippet from your evp-generated code (see screenshot).
Paste the snippet into your page/post.
